A place to organise a list of upcoming non-technical events that we might consider a presence at.

Also worth looking at these pages if you're considering attending an event:-

* https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuAtConferences
* https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ConferenceTopTips
